member.name: M:RedipalCore.Interfaces.IRediReader.GetIncrementedID(System.String)
member.summary: Increments the number stored at key by increment. If the key does not exist, it is set to 0 before performing the operation. An error is returned if the key contains a value of the wrong type or contains a string that is not representable as integer. This operation is limited to 64 bit signed integers.

member.summary: Will write the given object and save it to the specified key space. If an IBatch is given it will add the database calls to que and Batch.ExucuteAll must to called to save the data.

members.member:
This will add the objects in the list to
Parameters: list: The list to be wrote. setKey: The key of the set where the index of the values will be wrote.

member.summary: If true it allows RediPal to use up to 100% of the available CPU. false is default

member.summary: Default: True

member.name: P:RedipalCore.Objects.RediSubscriberOptions.SubscribeToSubObjects
member.summary: Default: False

member.summary: Default: True

member.summary: Default: True

member.summary: Default: True

member.summary: Default: 10

member.name: P:RedipalCore.Objects.RediWriteOptions.KeySpace
member.summary: This is the Key space the object will be wrote under in redis this is not necessary to set if the attribute "RediKeySpace" is applied to the object class

member.name: P:RedipalCore.Objects.RediWriteOptions.ID
member.summary: This is the id the object will be wrote under in redis the will be located at {KeySpace}:{ID}. this is not necessary to set if the attribute "RediWriteName" is applied to a property on the object

member.name: P:RedipalCore.Objects.RediWriteOptions.DeleteExisting
member.summary: If true then the existing object(s) in the given space will be deleted and replaced

member.name: P:RedipalCore.Objects.RediWriteOptions.Expiration
member.summary: The object being wrote will expire in the given time

member.summary: The writer will append the object ID to the sets in this list

member.name: P:RedipalCore.Objects.RediWriteOptions.SearchableSetsToAppend
member.summary: The writer will append the object ID to the sets in this list

member.name: P:RedipalCore.Objects.RediWriteOptions.SetsToRemove
member.summary: The writer will remove the id from the given sets

member.name: P:RedipalCore.Objects.RediWriteOptions.RediBatch
member.summary: The batch that the redis calls will be added to, if not set it will be controlled internally
